title: The After Show Digs Through the Mail Bag
itunes:title: The After Show Digs Through the Mail Bag
description:
This week, the boys pull some messages from the mail bag. What is on the minds of our viewers and listeners?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Tags

The Cigar Authority, Two Guys Smoke Shop, Studio 21 Podcast Café, United Podcast Network, cigars,
